info.description:
Testing Swagger spec. It's still in progress

The API may return incorrect response codes and have bugs.
info.title: Golang OGREE API

get.description: Returns JSON body with all subobjects under the Tenant
get.summary: Obtain all objects related to Tenant in the system.

parameters.description: Name of Tenant
parameters.name: name

200.description: Found. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

404.description: Nothing Found. An error message will be returned.

post.description:
Create an account with Email credentials, it returns
a JWT key to use with the API. The
authorize and 'Try it out' buttons don't work

parameters.description: Your Email Address
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: Your password
parameters.name: password

get.description: Returns JSON body with all specified objects of type and their IDs
get.summary: Gets all present objects for specified category in the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the location. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices", "room-templates", "obj-templates", "rooms", "separators", "acs", "panels", "aisles", "tiles", "cabinets", "groups", "corridors", "sensors" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

200.description: Found. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

404.description: Nothing Found. An error message will be returned.

get.description:
The ID must be provided in the URL parameter
The name can be used instead of ID if the obj is tenant
get.summary: Gets an Object from the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the location. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices", "room-templates", "obj-templates", "rooms", "separators", "acs", "panels", "aisles", "tiles", "cabinets", "groups", "corridors","sensors" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: ID of desired object or Name of Tenant. For templates the slug is the ID
parameters.name: ID

200.description: Found. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

400.description: Bad request. An error message will be returned.

404.description: Not Found. An error message will be returned.

put.description:
This method will replace the existing data with the JSON
received, thus fully replacing the data. If you do not
want to do this, please use PATCH.
If the operation succeeds, the data result will be returned.
If no new or any information is provided
an OK will still be returned
put.summary: Changes Object data in the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the location. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices", "room-templates", "obj-templates", "rooms", "separators", "acs", "panels", "aisles", "tiles", "cabinets", "groups", "corridors","sensors" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: ID of desired Object. If modifying templates, the "slug" should be used instead of ID
parameters.name: ID

parameters.description: Name of Object
parameters.name: Name

parameters.description: Category of Object (ex. Consumer Electronics, Medical)
parameters.name: Category

parameters.description: Description of Object
parameters.name: Description

parameters.description: Domain of the Object
parameters.name: Domain

parameters.description: Any other object attributes can be updated
parameters.name: Attributes

200.description: Updated. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

400.description: Bad request. An error message will be returned.

404.description: Not Found. An error message will be returned.

delete.summary: Deletes an Object in the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the location. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices", "room-templates", "obj-templates", "rooms", "separators", "acs", "panels", "aisles", "tiles", "cabinets", "groups", "corridors","sensors" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: ID of desired object. For templates the slug is the ID
parameters.name: ID

204.description: Successfully deleted object. No response body will be returned

404.description: Not found. An error message will be returned

patch.description:
This is the preferred method for modifying data in the system.
If you want to do a full data replace, please use PUT instead.
If the operation succeeds, the data result will be returned.
If no new or any information is provided
an OK will still be returned
patch.summary: Partially update data in the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the location. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices", "room-templates", "obj-templates", "rooms", "separators", "acs", "panels", "aisles", "tiles", "cabinets", "groups", "corridors", "sensors" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: ID of desired Object. If modifying templates, the "slug" should be used instead of ID
parameters.name: ID

parameters.description: Name of Object
parameters.name: Name

parameters.description: Category of Object (ex. Consumer Electronics, Medical)
parameters.name: Category

parameters.description: Description of Object
parameters.name: Description

parameters.description: Domain of the Object
parameters.name: Domain

parameters.description: Any other object attributes can be updated
parameters.name: Attributes

200.description: Updated. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

400.description: Bad request. An error message will be returned.

404.description: Not Found. An error message will be returned.

get.description: The path can only contain object type or object names
get.summary: A category of objects of a Parent Object can be retrieved from the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the object. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: ID of desired object
parameters.name: ID

parameters.description: Hierarchal path to desired object(s). For rooms it can additionally have "acs","panels","separators", "aisles","tiles","corridors", "sensors" and "cabinets". For devices it can have "sensors" For racks it can have "sensors"

200.description: Found. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

404.description: Not Found. An error message will be returned.

get.description:
Returns JSON body with all subobjects under the Object.
Note that objects returned will also included relevant objects.
(ie Room will contain acs, separators etc. Racks and devices will contain sensors)
get.summary: Obtain all objects related to specified object in the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the object. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: ID of object
parameters.name: ID

parameters.description: Limits the level of hierarchy for retrieval. if not specified for devices then the default value is maximum. Example: /api/devices/{id}/all?limit=2
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Found. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

404.description: Nothing Found. An error message will be returned.

get.description:
Gets an Object using any attribute (with the exception of description)
via query in the system
The attributes are in the form {attr}=xyz&{attr1}=abc
And any combination can be used given that at least 1 is provided.

parameters.description: Indicates the object. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices", "room-templates", "obj-templates", "separators","acs","panels", "aisles", "tiles", "cabinets", "groups", "corridors", and "sensors" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: Name of tenant
parameters.name: Name

parameters.description: Category of Tenant (ex. Consumer Electronics, Medical)
parameters.name: Category

parameters.description: Domain of the Tenant
parameters.name: Domain

parameters.description: Any other object attributes can be queried
parameters.name: Attributes

204.description: Found. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

404.description: Not found. An error message will be returned.

post.summary: Creates an object in the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the Object. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms", "racks", "devices", "acs", "panels", "separators","aisles", "tiles", "cabinets", "groups", "corridors", "room-templates", "obj-templates", "sensors" are acceptable
parameters.name: objs

parameters.description: Name of object
parameters.name: Name

parameters.description: Category of Object (ex. Consumer Electronics, Medical)
parameters.name: Category

parameters.description: Domain of Object
parameters.name: Domain

parameters.description: All objects are linked to a parent with the exception of Tenant since it has no parent
parameters.name: ParentID

parameters.description: Description of Object
parameters.name: Description

parameters.description: Any other object attributes can be added. They are required depending on the obj type.
parameters.name: Attributes

201.description: Created. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

400.description: Bad request. A response body with an error message will be returned.

get.description:
For Example: /api/tenants/{id}/buildings
Will return all buildings of a tenant
Returns JSON body with all subobjects under the Object
get.summary: Obtain all objects 2 levels lower in the system.

parameters.description: Indicates the object. Only values of "tenants", "sites", "buildings", "rooms" are acceptable
parameters.name: obj

parameters.description: ID of object
parameters.name: ID

parameters.description: Objects which 2 are levels lower in the hierarchy.
parameters.name: subent

200.description: Found. A response body will be returned with a meaningful message.

404.description: Nothing Found. An error message will be returned.
